item.title: A Look Into CloudEvents
item.description: Over the past few months, I’ve been looking into the internal architecture setup for Checkout.com and seeing how we can scale it for the next few years. As part of that research, I’ve been looking into the CloudEvents specification as a potential option as the basis for a common event schema across teams.
